title: Constructivist and Reversibility-Based Foundational Programming Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Experience in Logical Thinking
context.additional_context: Offline programming fundamentals competency-building course for working professionals to enhance workplace efficiency; learning progresses via individual mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can implement and debug simple algorithms using basic programming syntax (variables, conditionals, loops)
Learners can conceptually analyze and explain code execution processes using visual programming tools (MTL PV technique)
Learners can collaboratively resolve coding errors by applying reversibility principles (backward tracing) with peer learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
